comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 700222544. The contract was misstated in the standardized comments. The comments have been corrected and will be reflected in the second quarter of the 2013-14 Proactive Disclosure Report. The original comments have been replaced with the following: This contract was sourced non-competitively; and this contract is with a former public servant in receipt of a pension under the Public Service Superannuation Act.
